attributes.additional_details:
Insurance companies penalize people by voiding there policies some are for good reason some are accidental.

there needs to be a time limit on this , and not made up by the insurers. this situation damages peoples lives by forcing them to purchase high priced policies or not even purchasing insurance at all, the government needs to address this situation and tighten the policies the insurers need to follow to help customers by creating a time limit such as 3 to 5 years to admit such a situation. not forever.
